content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: andesite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "purple_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 3, "index": 19}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 19, "index": 28}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 44, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 3, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 19, "index": 37}, {"type": "end_portal_frame", "quantity": 29, "index": 39}, {"type": "magenta_dye", "quantity": 48, "index": 42}]

thought: I need to craft 6 andesite to craft the andesite_wall. To craft the andesite, I need to place a diorite and a cobblestone in the crafting grid. I will start by moving one of the three diorite from slot 19 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: andesite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "purple_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 19, "index": 28}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 44, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 3, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 19, "index": 37}, {"type": "end_portal_frame", "quantity": 29, "index": 39}, {"type": "magenta_dye", "quantity": 48, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I need to place a cobblestone next to the diorite in slot 1. I will move one of the three cobblestone from slot 35 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 2 with quantity 1

thought: I have crafted two andesite. I will move them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2

TASK: Craft an item of type: andesite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "purple_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 19, "index": 28}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 44, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 19, "index": 37}, {"type": "end_portal_frame", "quantity": 29, "index": 39}, {"type": "magenta_dye", "quantity": 48, "index": 42}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft an andesite wall. An andesite wall requires placing 6 andesite in a 2x3 grid, which in turn requires crafting 6 andesite. The first step is to craft the andesite, so I will move 1 diorite from slot 19 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: andesite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "purple_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 19, "index": 28}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 44, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 19, "index": 37}, {"type": "end_portal_frame", "quantity": 29, "index": 39}, {"type": "magenta_dye", "quantity": 48, "index": 42}]

Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: andesite_wall

Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 2 with quantity 1
